leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 结构生物-结构预测与评估生态
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 预测→精修→对齐→质量评估→可视化
leaf_cluster.tool_form: 推理框架 + 结构工具 + 可视化

tools.name: Omni-Mol
tools.one_line_profile: Multitask molecular model for any-to-any modalities
tools.detailed_description: A multitask molecular model designed to handle any-to-any modalities, implemented as part of a NeurIPS 2025 research contribution.

tools.name: 3Dmol.js
tools.one_line_profile: WebGL accelerated JavaScript molecular graphics library
tools.detailed_description: A widely used, object-oriented, WebGL-based JavaScript library for visualizing molecular data in web browsers, supporting various molecular file formats and rendering styles.

tools.name: jupyterlab_3Dmol
tools.one_line_profile: JupyterLab extension for py3Dmol
tools.detailed_description: A JupyterLab extension that enables the embedding and interaction with 3D molecular structures using the py3Dmol library within the JupyterLab environment.

tools.name: molview
tools.one_line_profile: IPython/Jupyter widget for interactive molecular visualization based on Mol*
tools.detailed_description: A Jupyter widget that integrates the Mol* (Molstar) framework for high-performance molecular visualization directly into IPython and Jupyter notebooks.

tools.name: nano-protein-viewer
tools.one_line_profile: VSCode extension for visualizing protein structures using Mol*
tools.detailed_description: A Visual Studio Code extension that provides a lightweight interface for visualizing protein structures (PDB/CIF) directly within the editor using the Mol* framework.

tools.name: MicrobeTrace
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization multitool for molecular epidemiology and bioinformatics
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive visualization tool developed for molecular epidemiology, enabling the integration and analysis of contact tracing networks and genomic data.

tools.name: ADplugin
tools.one_line_profile: Autodock/Vina plugin for PyMOL
tools.detailed_description: A PyMOL plugin that facilitates the setup, execution, and analysis of molecular docking simulations using AutoDock and AutoDock Vina directly within the PyMOL interface.

tools.name: Alphafold2import
tools.one_line_profile: PyMOL plugin to import AlphaFold2 models
tools.detailed_description: A PyMOL plugin designed to fetch and import predicted protein structures from the AlphaFold Protein Structure Database hosted by EMBL.

tools.name: KinaseDocker2
tools.one_line_profile: PyMOL plugin for kinase inhibitor binding and affinity prediction
tools.detailed_description: A specialized PyMOL plugin and Docker environment for predicting the binding modes and affinities of kinase inhibitors.

tools.name: Semagrams.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Graphical editor for graph-like structures in scientific computing
tools.detailed_description: A Julia-based graphical editor for creating and manipulating graph-like structures, often used in applied category theory and scientific modeling.

tools.name: BioViewer
tools.one_line_profile: Protein viewer for iOS and macOS using SwiftUI and Metal
tools.detailed_description: A native application for Apple devices to visualize protein structures (PDB, CIF, XYZ) with high performance using the Metal graphics API.

tools.name: Jupyter_Dock
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive molecular docking protocols in Jupyter Notebooks
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Jupyter Notebooks providing a workflow for interactive molecular docking, including visualization, file format conversion, and result analysis.

tools.name: shiny.molstar
tools.one_line_profile: R Shiny wrapper for Mol* visualization toolkit
tools.detailed_description: An R package that wraps the Mol* library, allowing users to embed interactive molecular visualizations within R Shiny web applications.

tools.name: molecular-design-toolkit
tools.one_line_profile: Notebook-integrated tools for molecular simulation and visualization
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit developed by Autodesk providing Python interfaces for molecular design, simulation, and visualization, optimized for use in Jupyter notebooks.

tools.name: molecule-3d-for-react
tools.one_line_profile: 3D molecular visualization React component using 3Dmol.js
tools.detailed_description: A React component wrapper for 3Dmol.js, enabling developers to easily integrate 3D molecular visualizations into React-based scientific applications.

tools.name: notebook-molecular-visualization
tools.one_line_profile: 2D and 3D molecular visualization in Jupyter notebooks
tools.detailed_description: A library for embedding 2D and 3D molecular visualizations in Jupyter notebooks, leveraging 3Dmol.js and D3.js for rendering.

tools.name: PyMOL-PUB
tools.one_line_profile: Rapid generation of high-quality structure figures for publication
tools.detailed_description: A PyMOL script/plugin designed to streamline the creation of publication-quality molecular structure figures with predefined styles and settings.

tools.name: Azahar
tools.one_line_profile: PyMOL plugin for glycan construction, visualization, and analysis
tools.detailed_description: A PyMOL plugin specifically developed for the modeling, visualization, and structural analysis of glycan molecules.

tools.name: PyMolSAR
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit to compute molecular features and predict activities
tools.detailed_description: A Python toolkit for Structure-Activity Relationship (SAR) analysis, capable of computing molecular features and predicting properties of small molecules.

tools.name: ASAP
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis and visualization of crystal or molecular structure datasets
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for the rapid analysis and visualization of large datasets of atomic structures, including crystal and molecular systems.

tools.name: ring-pymol
tools.one_line_profile: PyMOL plugin for Residue Interaction Network Generator (RING)
tools.detailed_description: A PyMOL plugin that visualizes residue interaction networks within protein structures, based on the RING software.

tools.name: volArea
tools.one_line_profile: VMD plugin for volume and surface area calculation
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for Visual Molecular Dynamics (VMD) that calculates the volume and surface area of chemical structures.

tools.name: Jmol-SwingJS
tools.one_line_profile: SwingJS-compatible Jmol/JSmol for Java and JavaScript visualization
tools.detailed_description: A port of the Jmol molecular visualization software to JavaScript via SwingJS, enabling Jmol features in web environments.

tools.name: PyXlinkViewer
tools.one_line_profile: PyMOL plugin for visualizing cross-linking mass spectrometry data
tools.detailed_description: A PyMOL plugin designed to visualize cross-linking constraints derived from mass spectrometry experiments on 3D protein structures.

tools.name: Molecules
tools.one_line_profile: Open source 3-D molecular visualizer for iOS
tools.detailed_description: An open-source application for iOS devices that allows users to download and visualize 3D molecular structures from the PDB.

tools.name: MoleculesMac
tools.one_line_profile: Mac version of the Molecules molecular visualizer
tools.detailed_description: The macOS desktop version of the Molecules application for 3D molecular visualization.

tools.name: MolecularNodes
tools.one_line_profile: Toolbox for molecular animations in Blender using Geometry Nodes
tools.detailed_description: A Blender add-on that enables the import and high-quality rendering/animation of molecular structures using Blender's Geometry Nodes system.

tools.name: MOL
tools.one_line_profile: Joint Estimation of Micro-Expression, Optical Flow, and Landmark
tools.detailed_description: A computer vision model for the joint estimation of micro-expressions, optical flow, and landmarks, published in TPAMI 2025.

tools.name: Caleydo
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization framework for molecular biology
tools.detailed_description: A visualization framework and suite of tools designed for the exploration and analysis of molecular biology data, including gene expression and pathways.

tools.name: DuIvyTools
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to process and visualize GROMACS MD simulation results
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based toolset for processing, analyzing, and visualizing the output of molecular dynamics simulations performed with GROMACS.

tools.name: rdfreader
tools.one_line_profile: Reader for CTAB .rdf files in Python
tools.detailed_description: A Python library to read and parse CTAB .rdf files, capturing reaction and molecular records along with additional data fields.

tools.name: colvars
tools.one_line_profile: Collective variables library for molecular simulation
tools.detailed_description: A software library for molecular simulation programs that implements collective variables for enhanced sampling and analysis.

tools.name: pymol-remote
tools.one_line_profile: Remote control and data transfer for PyMOL
tools.detailed_description: A utility to send data to and control a local PyMOL instance from a remote server, facilitating visualization workflows in distributed environments.

tools.name: cuemol2
tools.one_line_profile: CueMol molecular visualization framework
tools.detailed_description: A molecular visualization framework designed to display and annotate macromolecular structures.

tools.name: Mol-LLaMA
tools.one_line_profile: Large Molecular Language Model for general molecule understanding
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of Mol-LLaMA, a large language model designed to understand and generate molecular representations and properties.

tools.name: xpyder
tools.one_line_profile: PyMOL plugin for analyzing cross-linking data
tools.detailed_description: A PyMOL plugin for the analysis and visualization of cross-linking mass spectrometry data mapped onto 3D structures.

tools.name: vmd-python
tools.one_line_profile: Installable VMD as a Python module
tools.detailed_description: A Python module that wraps the Visual Molecular Dynamics (VMD) software, allowing it to be imported and used directly within Python scripts.

tools.name: CEEMDAN-VMD-GRU
tools.one_line_profile: CEEMDAN-VMD-LSTM Forecasting model
tools.detailed_description: A forecasting model combining CEEMDAN, Variational Mode Decomposition (VMD), and GRU/LSTM for time series analysis.

tools.name: CEEMDAN_LSTM
tools.one_line_profile: Hybrid forecasting model combining CEEMDAN decomposition and LSTM
tools.detailed_description: A Python project implementing decomposition-integration forecasting models based on Complete Ensemble Empirical Mode Decomposition with Adaptive Noise (CEEMDAN) and Long Short-Term Memory (LSTM) networks, typically used for time series analysis in physics or economics.

tools.name: ArtiaX
tools.one_line_profile: Cryo-ET visualization extension for UCSF ChimeraX
tools.detailed_description: An open-source extension for the molecular visualization program ChimeraX, designed to facilitate the processing, analysis, and visualization of Cryo-Electron Tomography (Cryo-ET) data.

tools.name: Global-Chem
tools.one_line_profile: Knowledge graph of common chemical names and molecular definitions
tools.detailed_description: A knowledge graph and python package that maps common chemical names to their molecular definitions (SMILES, SMARTS), serving as a dictionary for cheminformatics and drug discovery tasks.

tools.name: 3DMolFormer
tools.one_line_profile: Dual-channel framework for structure-based drug discovery
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the 3DMolFormer model (ICLR 2025), a dual-channel framework designed for structure-based drug discovery tasks, leveraging 3D molecular information.

tools.name: JChemPaint
tools.one_line_profile: 2D chemical structure editor and viewer
tools.detailed_description: A chemical 2D structure editor application and applet based on the Chemistry Development Kit (CDK), allowing users to draw and edit chemical structures.

tools.name: PymolFold
tools.one_line_profile: Protein folding simulation interface for PyMOL
tools.detailed_description: A PyMOL plugin that provides an interface for protein folding simulations, allowing users to visualize and manipulate protein folding processes directly within the PyMOL environment.

tools.name: 3DMolMS
tools.one_line_profile: Prediction of tandem mass spectra from 3D molecular conformations
tools.detailed_description: A bioinformatics tool for predicting tandem mass spectra based on 3D molecular conformations, aiding in the identification and characterization of molecules.

tools.name: Glance
tools.one_line_profile: Web-based visualization tool for volumetric and molecular data
tools.detailed_description: An open-source web application developed by Kitware for visualizing volumetric images, molecular structures, geometric objects, and point clouds, built on VTK.js and ITK.js.

tools.name: Bakerlab PyMOL Scripts
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of PyMOL scripts from Baker Lab
tools.detailed_description: A repository of PyMOL scripts used and developed by the Baker Lab (University of Washington) for protein structure analysis, visualization, and design tasks.

tools.name: dsatools
tools.one_line_profile: Digital signal analysis library for Python
tools.detailed_description: A library for digital signal analysis, processing, and parameter estimation, including methods like Empirical Mode Decomposition (EMD), Variational Mode Decomposition (VMD), and Singular Spectrum Analysis (SSA).

tools.name: GetBox-PyMOL-Plugin
tools.one_line_profile: PyMOL plugin for calculating docking boxes
tools.detailed_description: A PyMOL plugin designed to calculate and visualize docking boxes for molecular docking software such as LeDock, AutoDock, and AutoDock Vina.

tools.name: ili
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization of molecular maps in 2D and 3D
tools.detailed_description: Web-based software for the interactive visualization of molecular maps (e.g., metabolomics, proteomics) on 2D and 3D models, facilitating spatial analysis of molecular data.

tools.name: BioBlender
tools.one_line_profile: Blender addon for molecular visualization and animation
tools.detailed_description: An addon for the open-source 3D creation suite Blender, enabling users to import biological data (PDB, etc.) and perform molecular visualization and animation.

tools.name: pymolshortcuts
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of productivity shortcuts for PyMOL
tools.detailed_description: A library of shortcuts and extended commands for PyMOL, loaded at startup to enhance productivity, enable web searches from within PyMOL, and streamline common visualization tasks.

tools.name: Avogadro
tools.one_line_profile: Advanced molecular editor and visualization tool
tools.detailed_description: An advanced molecular editor and visualizer designed for cross-platform use in computational chemistry, molecular modeling, bioinformatics, and materials science.

tools.name: Avogadro Libraries
tools.one_line_profile: Core libraries for Avogadro molecular modeling software
tools.detailed_description: The core libraries providing 3D rendering, visualization, analysis, and data processing capabilities for the Avogadro molecular editor and other computational chemistry applications.

tools.name: BioBlender21
tools.one_line_profile: Updated Blender plugin for biological data processing
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for Blender designed to process biological data and perform molecular visualization work, serving as a modern iteration or fork of the BioBlender project.

tools.name: molorbdraw
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for visualizing molecular orbitals from cube files
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool for visualizing molecular orbitals by processing cube files, useful for quantum chemistry and electronic structure analysis.

tools.name: Pymol-script-repo
tools.one_line_profile: Community collection of PyMOL scripts
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive repository of scripts for PyMOL, providing various extensions and utilities for structural biology visualization and analysis, maintained by the community.

tools.name: COOT (CO-Optimal Transport)
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for Co-Optimal Transport (COOT) problem solving
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of the Co-Optimal Transport (COOT) algorithm, which optimizes the transport plan between two datasets by simultaneously aligning their samples and features. Useful in machine learning and potential omics data alignment.

tools.name: UCSF ChimeraX
tools.one_line_profile: Next-generation molecular visualization and analysis program
tools.detailed_description: The source code for UCSF ChimeraX, a highly extensible program for interactive visualization and analysis of molecular structures and related data, including density maps, supramolecular assemblies, and sequence alignments.

tools.name: PyRosetta Viewer3D
tools.one_line_profile: Jupyter notebook widget for visualizing Rosetta PackedPose and Pose objects
tools.detailed_description: A visualization tool that allows users to display and interact with Rosetta PackedPose objects, Pose objects, or PDB files directly within a Jupyter notebook or Google Colab environment, facilitating interactive modeling workflows.

tools.name: Rosetta
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive software suite for macromolecular modeling and design
tools.detailed_description: The Rosetta software suite includes algorithms for computational modeling and analysis of protein structures. It has enabled notable scientific advances in computational biology, including de novo protein design, enzyme design, and ligand docking.

tools.name: Molly
tools.one_line_profile: Large Language Model designed for multi-omics data understanding
tools.detailed_description: An AI model specifically trained or fine-tuned to process and interpret multi-omics data, aiming to bridge the gap between biological data modalities and natural language queries.

tools.name: XFEM_Fracture2D
tools.one_line_profile: MATLAB solver for 2D fracture problems using Extended Finite Element Method
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB program for solving fracture problems involving arbitrary multiple crack propagations in a 2D linear-elastic solid. It uses the Extended Finite Element Method (XFEM) to discretize the solid continuum with cracks as discontinuities.

tools.name: molecular-ts
tools.one_line_profile: TypeScript-based virtual chemistry and particle automata simulation
tools.detailed_description: A simulation tool for virtual chemistry and particle automata, visualizing the behavior of particles in 2D and 3D space. It is positioned for artificial life research and educational visualization of molecular dynamics concepts.

tools.name: MDV
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for analyzing and visualizing spatial and molecular datasets
tools.detailed_description: Multi-Dimensional Visualization (MDV) is an open-source toolkit designed for the analysis and visualization of spatial and molecular datasets, developed by the Taylor Computational Chemical Biology Group.

tools.name: VisualFactory
tools.one_line_profile: Cinematic molecular visualization scripts
tools.detailed_description: A collection of scripts designed to produce high-quality, cinematic visualizations of molecular structures, bridging scientific accuracy with visual impact for presentations and publications.

tools.name: AMDock
tools.one_line_profile: Assisted molecular docking pipeline for AutoDock4 and AutoDock Vina
tools.detailed_description: A graphical tool to assist in the molecular docking process using AutoDock4 and AutoDock Vina. It streamlines the preparation, execution, and analysis of docking simulations on Linux and macOS systems.

tools.name: AMDock-win
tools.one_line_profile: Windows version of the AMDock molecular docking pipeline
tools.detailed_description: The Windows compatible version of AMDock, providing a graphical interface for assisted molecular docking using AutoDock4 and AutoDock Vina.

tools.name: VMD (Variational Mode Decomposition)
tools.one_line_profile: MATLAB implementation of Variational Mode Decomposition
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB implementation of Variational Mode Decomposition (VMD) and its variants. VMD is a signal processing technique used to decompose a signal into a set of band-limited modes, widely used in engineering and physics data analysis.

tools.name: NExT-Mol
tools.one_line_profile: 3D molecule generation using diffusion and language modeling
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of 'NExT-Mol: 3D Diffusion Meets 1D Language Modeling for 3D Molecule Generation'. It combines 3D geometric diffusion models with 1D chemical language models for generating valid and conformationally accurate 3D molecules.

tools.name: TopoTools
tools.one_line_profile: VMD plugin for manipulating molecular topology information
tools.detailed_description: A VMD plugin that provides commands to manipulate the topology of a molecule (atoms, bonds, angles, dihedrals, impropers) and allows writing out the modified structure in various file formats (e.g., LAMMPS data files).

tools.name: Atomify
tools.one_line_profile: Real-time molecular dynamics simulation in the browser
tools.detailed_description: A tool that enables real-time molecular dynamics simulations directly in a web browser using a compiled version of LAMMPS. It allows for interactive visualization and manipulation of atomic systems.

tools.name: Mol-CycleGAN
tools.one_line_profile: Generative model for molecular optimization using CycleGAN
tools.detailed_description: A generative model based on CycleGAN architecture designed for molecular optimization tasks. It learns to map molecules between two domains (e.g., active and inactive) to generate optimized molecular structures.

tools.name: st-speckmol
tools.one_line_profile: Streamlit component for Speck molecular visualization
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that provides a Streamlit component for rendering molecular structures using the Speck renderer. It enables the integration of high-quality molecular visualizations into Streamlit-based scientific web applications.

tools.name: RCSB Sequence Viewer
tools.one_line_profile: PDB Amino Acid Sequence Viewer
tools.detailed_description: A Java-based viewer for visualizing amino acid sequences from PDB entries, developed by the BioJava project. It provides a graphical representation of protein sequences and their annotations.

tools.name: Ammolite
tools.one_line_profile: Interface between Biotite and PyMOL for structure visualization
tools.detailed_description: A Python package that acts as an interface between the Biotite bioinformatics package and PyMOL. It allows users to visualize AtomArrays and other Biotite structure objects directly in PyMOL.

tools.name: GPUMD
tools.one_line_profile: General-purpose molecular dynamics package using Graphics Processing Units
tools.detailed_description: A highly efficient molecular dynamics simulation package designed to run on GPUs. It supports various potentials and is optimized for large-scale atomistic simulations, enabling the generation of structural data and dynamics trajectories.

tools.name: pymol-color-alphafold
tools.one_line_profile: PyMOL plugin to color AlphaFold structures by pLDDT confidence scores
tools.detailed_description: A PyMOL extension that allows users to color AlphaFold-predicted protein structures based on their per-residue confidence scores (pLDDT). This aids in the visual assessment of prediction quality and structural reliability.

tools.name: Illustrate
tools.one_line_profile: Non-photorealistic biomolecular illustration tool
tools.detailed_description: A Fortran-based tool designed to generate non-photorealistic, cartoon-like illustrations of biomolecules. It is widely used for creating publication-quality figures that emphasize structural features through stylized rendering.

tools.name: Atomic
tools.one_line_profile: Modern molecular visualization software for macOS and iOS
tools.detailed_description: A Swift-based molecular visualizer designed for Apple platforms, providing high-quality 3D rendering of atomic structures. It supports standard file formats and offers a modern interface for inspecting biomolecules.

tools.name: PyMOLfold
tools.one_line_profile: PyMOL plugin for predicting protein structures from sequences
tools.detailed_description: A plugin that integrates structure prediction capabilities directly into PyMOL, allowing users to fold protein sequences and visualize the predicted 3D structures within the PyMOL environment.

tools.name: AHoJ
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for aligning and analyzing Apo and Holo protein structures
tools.detailed_description: A command-line tool and web server backend for searching and aligning APO (unbound) protein structures with their HOLO (bound) counterparts. It facilitates the analysis of conformational changes upon ligand binding.

tools.name: MolArt
tools.one_line_profile: Web-based molecular structure annotator and visualizer
tools.detailed_description: A JavaScript library and tool for visualizing macromolecular structures and mapping sequence annotations (such as domains, variants, and binding sites) onto the 3D structure in an interactive web environment.

tools.name: ipymol
tools.one_line_profile: Python interface for controlling PyMOL via IPython/Jupyter
tools.detailed_description: A library that enables the control of PyMOL sessions directly from IPython or Jupyter Notebooks. It facilitates reproducible visualization workflows and the integration of PyMOL rendering into Python-based analysis pipelines.

tools.name: RMD_Digging
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis and visualization toolkit for Reactive Molecular Dynamics (ReaxFF)
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB-based toolkit for pre-processing and post-processing ReaxFF molecular dynamics simulations. It includes features for parameter formatting, structural analysis, trajectory statistics, and mechanism analysis.

tools.name: Uni-Mol
tools.one_line_profile: Universal 3D molecular representation learning framework
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive framework for 3D molecular representation learning. It provides pre-trained models and tools for various downstream tasks, including molecular property prediction, 3D conformation generation, and structure-based analysis.

tools.name: HotSpot3D
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for identifying 3D proximity of mutations in protein structures
tools.detailed_description: A software suite for analyzing mutation data in the context of 3D protein structures. It identifies spatial clusters of mutations (hotspots) and potential drug-binding sites, aiding in the interpretation of cancer genomics data.

tools.name: show_contacts
tools.one_line_profile: PyMOL plugin for visualizing polar contacts and interactions
tools.detailed_description: A PyMOL script/plugin designed to identify and visualize polar contacts and other non-covalent interactions within protein structures or protein-ligand complexes, facilitating structural analysis.

tools.name: BlendMol
tools.one_line_profile: Blender plugin for importing VMD visualizations
tools.detailed_description: A Blender plugin that allows users to import visualization states from VMD (Visual Molecular Dynamics) into Blender. This enables the creation of high-quality, ray-traced renderings of molecular scenes prepared in VMD.

tools.name: Pyrite
tools.one_line_profile: Blender plugin for importing molecular dynamics trajectories
tools.detailed_description: A tool that facilitates the import of molecular dynamics trajectories into Blender for high-quality visualization and animation. It supports various molecular representations and allows for cinematic rendering of simulation data.

tools.name: Miew
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance web-based molecular viewer
tools.detailed_description: A 3D molecular viewer designed for web applications, capable of rendering large biomolecular structures. It supports various display modes, coloring schemes, and file formats, making it suitable for embedding in scientific web platforms.

tools.name: GRADE
tools.one_line_profile: Code for determining and analyzing clathrate hydrate structures
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed to analyze atomic positions of water molecules to identify and classify clathrate hydrate cages (e.g., 5^12, 6^2 5^12). It can process trajectory data for visualization in VMD and calculate order parameters.

tools.name: qc_pymol
tools.one_line_profile: Scripts for visualizing quantum chemistry outputs in PyMOL
tools.detailed_description: A collection of scripts that bridge quantum chemistry programs with PyMOL, allowing for the visualization of orbitals, densities, and other QC calculation results within the PyMOL environment.

tools.name: ferritin
tools.one_line_profile: Rust library for protein structure manipulation and analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Rust-based library providing utilities for handling protein structure data (PDB/mmCIF). It aims to offer high-performance tools for parsing, analyzing, and manipulating macromolecular structures.

tools.name: vmd_density_profile
tools.one_line_profile: VMD tool for computing 1-D atomic densities
tools.detailed_description: A VMD plugin that calculates one-dimensional atomic density profiles from molecular dynamics simulations. It is useful for analyzing the distribution of species across membranes or interfaces.

tools.name: vmd_diffusion_coefficient
tools.one_line_profile: VMD tool for computing diffusion coefficients
tools.detailed_description: A VMD plugin designed to calculate diffusion coefficients from molecular dynamics trajectories using the Einstein relation (MSD). It simplifies the analysis of transport properties in simulation data.

tools.name: MolMil
tools.one_line_profile: WebGL-based molecular viewer for PDB and mmCIF formats
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight, web-based molecular viewer capable of rendering structures from PDB and mmCIF files. It utilizes WebGL for high-performance rendering in the browser.

tools.name: molvwr
tools.one_line_profile: WebGL-based molecular viewer using Babylon.js
tools.detailed_description: A web-based application for visualizing 3D molecular structures, built on top of the Babylon.js 3D engine, supporting standard molecular file formats.

tools.name: mdciao
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis and visualization tool for molecular dynamics simulations
tools.detailed_description: A Python package designed for the accessible analysis and visualization of molecular dynamics (MD) simulation data, with a focus on residue-residue contacts and geometric properties.

tools.name: robocrystallographer
tools.one_line_profile: Automatic generation of crystal structure descriptions
tools.detailed_description: A tool that generates human-readable text descriptions of crystal structures from standard structure files (e.g., CIF), facilitating the interpretation and reporting of materials science data.

tools.name: md-analysis-tools
tools.one_line_profile: Scripts for analyzing molecular dynamics trajectories with VMD
tools.detailed_description: A collection of scripts and tools to facilitate the analysis of molecular dynamics simulations, specifically designed to work within the VMD (Visual Molecular Dynamics) environment.

tools.name: esigen
tools.one_line_profile: Generator for computational chemistry supporting information documents
tools.detailed_description: A command-line tool that automates the creation of supporting information (SI) documents for computational chemistry publications, extracting data from output files.

tools.name: CellDepot
tools.one_line_profile: Repository and visualization platform for scRNA-seq data
tools.detailed_description: A unified system for storing, managing, and visually exploring single-cell RNA sequencing (scRNA-seq) data, supporting scientific data sharing and analysis.

tools.name: xyz2mol
tools.one_line_profile: Converter from XYZ coordinates to RDKit molecular objects
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool that infers molecular connectivity and bond orders from raw Cartesian coordinates (XYZ files), enabling the conversion of geometric data into chemically aware RDKit objects.

tools.name: Token-Mol
tools.one_line_profile: Tokenized drug design using large language models
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning framework for de novo drug design that utilizes tokenization strategies and large language models to generate molecular structures with desired properties.

tools.name: quarto-molstar
tools.one_line_profile: Mol* viewer embedding for Quarto documents
tools.detailed_description: A Quarto extension that allows researchers to easily embed interactive 3D protein structures and trajectories using the Mol* viewer directly into scientific documents and presentations.

tools.name: chemkit
tools.one_line_profile: C++ library for molecular modeling and visualization
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive C++ library designed for cheminformatics, molecular modeling, and visualization, providing algorithms and data structures for chemical data processing.

tools.name: CrystaLLM
tools.one_line_profile: Large Language Model for crystal structure generation
tools.detailed_description: A generative AI model trained on CIF files to generate valid crystal structures, leveraging the text-based representation of crystallographic data.

tools.name: caver-pymol-plugin
tools.one_line_profile: PyMOL plugin for protein tunnel visualization
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for PyMOL that interfaces with the CAVER software to calculate and visualize tunnels and channels in protein structures, developed by the Loschmidt Laboratories.

tools.name: mol-draw
tools.one_line_profile: Lightweight 3D molecular viewer for web applications
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight JavaScript/PureScript library for rendering 3D molecular structures in web applications, focusing on ease of integration and performance.

tools.name: stk-vis
tools.one_line_profile: Cross-platform application for visualizing molecular databases
tools.detailed_description: A desktop application designed to visualize and explore databases of molecules, particularly useful for browsing results from generative molecular design workflows.

tools.name: Dynamics PyMOL Plugin
tools.one_line_profile: Plugin for PyMOL to visualize and analyze molecular dynamics simulations
tools.detailed_description: A PyMOL plugin designed to facilitate the visualization and analysis of molecular dynamics trajectories directly within the PyMOL environment.

tools.name: GenUI Backend
tools.one_line_profile: Backend services for the GenUI framework supporting molecular generation and QSAR
tools.detailed_description: The backend infrastructure for GenUI, providing REST APIs for drug discovery tasks including molecular generation, QSAR modelling, and chemical space visualization.

tools.name: MichelaNGLo
tools.one_line_profile: Web application to convert PyMOL sessions to NGL.js views
tools.detailed_description: A web-based tool that facilitates the conversion of PyMOL PSE files or PDB files into NGL.js compatible views, enabling easy embedding of interactive molecular visualizations on websites.

tools.name: rdkit_to_params
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to generate Rosetta params files from RDKit molecules
tools.detailed_description: A Python utility to create or modify Rosetta parameter files (topology files) starting from RDKit molecule objects, facilitating the preparation of ligands for Rosetta modeling.

tools.name: PDB Viewer (Rust+WASM)
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance web-based PDB viewer using Rust and WebAssembly
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight and fast PDB molecular structure viewer built with Rust and compiled to WebAssembly, designed to run in the browser without a backend.

tools.name: MetGem
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization of molecular networks using t-SNE
tools.detailed_description: Software for the calculation and visualization of molecular networks, utilizing the t-SNE algorithm to explore chemical space and relationships, often used in metabolomics.

tools.name: FS-Mol
tools.one_line_profile: Few-Shot Learning Dataset and Benchmark for Molecules
tools.detailed_description: A dataset and evaluation benchmark designed for few-shot learning research on molecular compounds, supporting tasks like activity prediction against protein targets.

tools.name: MIFit
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive graphics application for protein structure refinement
tools.detailed_description: A cross-platform interactive graphics tool designed for molecular modeling, fitting, and refinement of protein structures derived from X-ray crystallography data.

tools.name: MoleView
tools.one_line_profile: Fast and lightweight plug-in for 3D molecular visualization
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based plug-in designed to provide fast and lightweight 3D molecular visualization capabilities, suitable for integration into other workflows.

tools.name: Mol* VSCode Extension
tools.one_line_profile: VSCode extension for interactive protein structure visualization
tools.detailed_description: An extension for Visual Studio Code that embeds the Mol* viewer, allowing developers and researchers to visualize protein structures (PDB, mmCIF) directly within the code editor.

tools.name: ipymolstar
tools.one_line_profile: Jupyter widget for Mol* molecular visualization
tools.detailed_description: A Jupyter widget that integrates the Mol* viewer into Jupyter notebooks, enabling interactive molecular visualization within data science workflows.

tools.name: Mol* View Spec
tools.one_line_profile: Mechanism for describing molecular visualization views
tools.detailed_description: A library and specification for defining and sharing molecular visualization states and views in a generic, reproducible manner.

tools.name: Mol*
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive macromolecular visualization library
tools.detailed_description: A modern, high-performance, open-source library for the visualization and analysis of large-scale macromolecular structures, widely used by PDB and other databases.

tools.name: Mol* Volumes & Segmentations
tools.one_line_profile: Mol* extension for volumetric and segmentation data
tools.detailed_description: An extension for the Mol* viewer specifically designed to handle and visualize volumetric data (e.g., cryo-EM maps) and segmentation data.

tools.name: RCSB Mol*
tools.one_line_profile: RCSB PDB specific implementation of Mol*
tools.detailed_description: The customized implementation of the Mol* viewer used by the RCSB Protein Data Bank, including specific plugins and property viewers for PDB data.

tools.name: Moorhen
tools.one_line_profile: Web-based molecular graphics and model building program
tools.detailed_description: A web-based molecular graphics application derived from Coot, enabling model building and refinement of macromolecular structures directly in the browser.

tools.name: Stmol
tools.one_line_profile: Streamlit component for molecular visualization
tools.detailed_description: A Streamlit component that wraps py3Dmol to enable easy rendering of molecular structures within Streamlit web applications for data science.

tools.name: iCn3D
tools.one_line_profile: Web-based 3D structure viewer by NCBI
tools.detailed_description: A web-based 3D viewer for visualizing and analyzing macromolecular structures, developed by NCBI, supporting interactive and batch mode analysis.

tools.name: NGL Viewer
tools.one_line_profile: WebGL-based molecular visualization library
tools.detailed_description: A widely used WebGL library for displaying large molecular structures (proteins, DNA, RNA) in web browsers, serving as the engine for many web-based viewers.

tools.name: IQmol
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular editor and visualization package for Q-Chem
tools.detailed_description: An open-source molecular editor and visualization package, primarily designed for the Q-Chem quantum chemistry package but useful for general molecular modeling.

tools.name: Coot Trimmings
tools.one_line_profile: Python customizations and scripts for Coot
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Python scripts and customizations to extend the functionality of the Coot macromolecular model building software.

tools.name: DockingPie
tools.one_line_profile: Consensus Docking Plugin for PyMOL
tools.detailed_description: A PyMOL plugin that integrates various molecular docking tools to perform consensus docking and analysis directly within the PyMOL interface.

tools.name: wSterimol
tools.one_line_profile: Generator for Boltzmann-weighted Sterimol steric parameters
tools.detailed_description: A Python program to generate Boltzmann-weighted Sterimol steric parameters for conformationally-flexible substituents, useful in computational chemistry and QSAR modeling.

tools.name: imolecule
tools.one_line_profile: Embeddable WebGL molecule viewer and format converter
tools.detailed_description: A JavaScript library for embedding interactive 3D molecular visualizations in web pages, supporting various file formats.

tools.name: Coot
tools.one_line_profile: Macromolecular model building, refinement and validation software
tools.detailed_description: A standard software package for macromolecular model building, model completion, and validation, particularly for X-ray crystallography and cryo-EM.

tools.name: DMPfold2
tools.one_line_profile: Fast and accurate protein structure prediction tool
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning-based method for protein structure prediction that uses distance geometry and molecular dynamics to generate 3D models from sequence data.

tools.name: PyMod
tools.one_line_profile: PyMOL plugin for sequence alignment and homology modeling
tools.detailed_description: A PyMOL plugin that acts as an interface for various bioinformatics tools (BLAST, ClustalO, MODELLER) to perform sequence analysis and homology modeling directly within the PyMOL environment.

tools.name: BondPack
tools.one_line_profile: PyMOL plugins to visualize atomic bonds
tools.detailed_description: A collection of PyMOL scripts/plugins designed to enhance the visualization of atomic bonds and interactions in molecular structures.

tools.name: P2Rank
tools.one_line_profile: Ligand binding site prediction based on machine learning
tools.detailed_description: A standalone command-line tool for predicting ligand binding sites from protein structures using machine learning (Random Forests).

tools.name: Restraintmaker
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to build restraints for Molecular Dynamics simulations
tools.detailed_description: A tool (available as a PyMOL plugin) to generate distance or position restraints for molecular dynamics simulations, particularly useful for dual-topology free energy calculations.

tools.name: ATOM-MOL-nonBO
tools.one_line_profile: Non-Born-Oppenheimer bound state calculations
tools.detailed_description: A Fortran program for performing precise bound state calculations of small atoms and molecules without assuming the Born-Oppenheimer approximation.

tools.name: PyMOL Open Source
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular visualization system
tools.detailed_description: The open-source foundation of the PyMOL molecular visualization system, widely used for 3D visualization of proteins, nucleic acids, and small molecules.

tools.name: pyMolDyn
tools.one_line_profile: Molecule viewer with cavity computation
tools.detailed_description: A molecular visualization tool that includes functionality for computing and visualizing cavities and channels within molecular structures.

tools.name: Vipster
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization and editing of periodic molecular structures
tools.detailed_description: A tool for visualizing and editing periodic molecular structure files, suitable for materials science and crystallography.

tools.name: VMD_python
tools.one_line_profile: Variational Mode Decomposition implementation
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of the Variational Mode Decomposition (VMD) algorithm, used for signal processing and time-series analysis.

tools.name: Pharao
tools.one_line_profile: Pharmacophore alignment tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool for pharmacophore alignment, allowing for the comparison and alignment of pharmacophoric features in drug discovery.

tools.name: pymol_viridis
tools.one_line_profile: Colorblind-friendly palettes for PyMOL
tools.detailed_description: A script that adds perceptually uniform and colorblind-friendly colormaps (like Viridis) to PyMOL, improving scientific visualization accessibility.

tools.name: PyVibMS
tools.one_line_profile: PyMOL plugin for visualizing vibrations
tools.detailed_description: A PyMOL plugin designed to visualize molecular vibrations and phonon modes in molecules and solids.

tools.name: Image2Smiles
tools.one_line_profile: Convert molecule images to SMILES
tools.detailed_description: A tool to recognize chemical structures from images and convert them into SMILES or MOL representations (Optical Chemical Structure Recognition).

tools.name: PSICO
tools.one_line_profile: PyMOL Script Collection
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive collection of Python scripts for PyMOL, extending its functionality for structural analysis, visualization, and file handling.

tools.name: ProteinPaint
tools.one_line_profile: Genomic and proteomic data visualization framework
tools.detailed_description: A web-based visualization tool for exploring genomic mutations and their impact on protein structures, developed by St. Jude Children's Research Hospital.

tools.name: Moorhen
tools.one_line_profile: Web-based molecular graphics and model building program
tools.detailed_description: A web-based molecular graphics application for macromolecular model building and refinement, serving as a modern web alternative to Coot.

tools.name: WEAS Widget
tools.one_line_profile: Jupyter widget for atomic structure visualization and editing
tools.detailed_description: A widget for Jupyter Notebooks that allows for interactive visualization and editing of atomic structures.

tools.name: r3dmol
tools.one_line_profile: R package for 3D molecular visualization
tools.detailed_description: An R package that provides an interface to the 3Dmol.js library, enabling interactive 3D visualization of molecular data within R environments.

tools.name: pandda_inspect_tools
tools.one_line_profile: COOT plugin for reviewing and building event maps from PanDDA analysis
tools.detailed_description: A minimalistic plugin for the crystallographic software COOT, designed to facilitate the review and model building of event maps generated by PanDDA (Pan-Dataset Density Analysis) in fragment screening.

tools.name: Trident Chemwidgets
tools.one_line_profile: Jupyter Widgets for interactive molecular dataset visualization
tools.detailed_description: A set of Jupyter Widgets that allow users to interact with and visualize molecular datasets directly within Jupyter notebooks/lab, facilitating cheminformatics and structural biology workflows.

tools.name: ISOLDE
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive molecular dynamics-based model building for ChimeraX
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for UCSF ChimeraX that uses interactive molecular dynamics to assist in building and refining high-quality atomic models into low-resolution crystallographic and cryo-EM maps.

tools.name: PyViewDock
tools.one_line_profile: PyMOL plugin for visualizing molecular docking results
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the PyMOL molecular visualization system designed to facilitate the analysis and visualization of molecular docking results.

tools.name: PySSA
tools.one_line_profile: Visual tool for protein Sequence to Structure Analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based rich client application for performing and visualizing protein sequence-to-structure analysis, aiding in the interpretation of structural features in the context of sequence data.

tools.name: enlighten2-pymol
tools.one_line_profile: PyMOL plugin for the enlighten2 protocol
tools.detailed_description: A PyMOL plugin that provides an interface for enlighten2, a tool for preparing and running molecular dynamics simulations, particularly for enzyme engineering and refinement.

tools.name: vmdpy
tools.one_line_profile: Python implementation of Variational Mode Decomposition
tools.detailed_description: A Python library implementing Variational Mode Decomposition (VMD), a signal processing technique for decomposing a signal into band-limited intrinsic mode functions. (Note: Distinct from Visual Molecular Dynamics).

tools.name: Mol-Opt
tools.one_line_profile: Toolbox for molecular design and optimization
tools.detailed_description: A toolbox designed for molecular optimization and design tasks, likely providing algorithms and interfaces for generative chemistry and drug discovery applications.

tools.name: pdbcolor
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to color PDB structures based on MSA parameters
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool that maps parameters from a multiple sequence alignment (MSA) onto a PDB structure by coloring the residues, useful for visualizing evolutionary conservation or other sequence-derived properties.

tools.name: PySDKit
tools.one_line_profile: Library for signal decomposition algorithms
tools.detailed_description: A Python library providing various algorithms for signal decomposition, useful for analyzing complex scientific data series.

tools.name: Speck
tools.one_line_profile: Browser-based WebGL molecule renderer
tools.detailed_description: A high-quality, browser-based molecular renderer using WebGL, focused on producing attractive and practical figures for molecular structures.

tools.name: PyMOL-Wasm
tools.one_line_profile: WebAssembly port of PyMOL for web-based visualization
tools.detailed_description: A project that ports the PyMOL molecular visualization system to WebAssembly, enabling it to run directly in web browsers without native installation.

tools.name: SurfStamp
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to prepare molecular surface representations for 3D printing
tools.detailed_description: A utility designed to generate 3D printer-compatible molecular surface representations, facilitating the physical fabrication of molecular models.

tools.name: ggmolvis
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular visualization bridge for MDAnalysis and Blender
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool that interfaces MDAnalysis with MolecularNodes in Blender, enabling high-quality rendering and visualization of molecular dynamics trajectories.

tools.name: Mol-Instructions
tools.one_line_profile: Large-scale biomolecular instruction dataset for LLMs
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive dataset of biomolecular instructions designed to train Large Language Models (LLMs) for tasks in biology and chemistry, serving as a foundational resource for AI4S.

tools.name: MDavocado
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization tool for molecular dynamics trajectories
tools.detailed_description: A standalone program for the visualization of molecular dynamics trajectories, providing essential viewing capabilities for simulation data.

tools.name: SPaMD
tools.one_line_profile: Integrated platform for materials and molecular design and dynamics
tools.detailed_description: Scalable Parallel Materials/Molecular Design/Dynamics Studio (SPaMD) is an integrated software platform for modeling, simulation, analysis, and visualization of materials at the atomic scale.
